content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/spring-boot-helloWorld is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure and understanding what we're working with.

Steps I should follow:
1. First, explore the directory structure
2. Look at the pom.xml to understand dependencies and current Java version
3. Update Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise

Let me start by viewing the repository structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

	<groupId>com.neo</groupId>
	<artifactId>spring-boot-helloworld</artifactId>
	<version>0.9.6-SNAPSHOT</version>
	<packaging>jar</packaging>

	<name>spring-boot-helloworld</name>
	<description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description>

	<parent>
		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
		<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
		<version>2.1.3.RELEASE</version>
		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
	</parent>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<java.version>1.8</java.version>
	</properties>

	<dependencies>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
			<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
			<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
			<scope>test</scope>
		</dependency>
	     <dependency>
	        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
	        <artifactId>spring-boot-devtools</artifactId>
	        <optional>true</optional>
		</dependency>
	</dependencies>
	
	<build>
		<plugins>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
				<artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<configuration>
	                <fork>true</fork>
	            </configuration>
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>

        <repositories>
            <repository>
                <id>aliyun-repos</id>
                <url>https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/public</url>
                <releases>
                    <enabled>true</enabled>
                </releases>
                <snapshots>
                    <enabled>false</enabled>
                </snapshots>
            </repository>
        </repositories>
        <pluginRepositories>
            <pluginRepository>
                <id>aliyun-repos</id>
                <url>https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/public</url>
                <releases>
                    <enabled>true</enabled>
                </releases>
                <snapshots>
                    <enabled>false</enabled>
                </snapshots>
            </pluginRepository>
        </pluginRepositories>

</project>

Now let me check the other test files:

Now I understand the project structure. This is a Spring Boot 2.1.3 project using Java 8. I need to:

1. Update Java version from 1.8 to 17
2. Update Spring Boot from 2.1.3.RELEASE to a version compatible with Java 17 (3.x is the latest)
3. Update test annotations from JUnit 4 to JUnit 5 (Spring Boot 2.2+ uses JUnit 5 by default)

Let me start by updating the pom.xml:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/spring-boot-helloWorld/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string: 	<parent>
		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
		<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
		<version>2.1.3.RELEASE</version>
		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
	</parent>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<java.version>1.8</java.version>
	</properties>
New string: 	<parent>
		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
		<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
		<version>3.2.2</version>
		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
	</parent>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<java.version>17</java.version>
	</properties>
Now I need to update the test files to use JUnit 5 instead of JUnit 4. Let me start with ApplicationTests.java:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/spring-boot-helloWorld/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string: 	<build>
		<plugins>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
				<artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<configuration>
	                <fork>true</fork>
	            </configuration>
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>
New string: 	<build>
		<plugins>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
				<artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

	<groupId>com.neo</groupId>
	<artifactId>spring-boot-helloworld</artifactId>
	<version>0.9.6-SNAPSHOT</version>
	<packaging>jar</packaging>

	<name>spring-boot-helloworld</name>
	<description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description>

	<parent>
		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
		<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
		<version>3.2.2</version>
		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
	</parent>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<java.version>17</java.version>
	</properties>

	<dependencies>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
			<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
			<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
			<scope>test</scope>
		</dependency>
	     <dependency>
	        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
	        <artifactId>spring-boot-devtools</artifactId>
	        <optional>true</optional>
		</dependency>
	</dependencies>
	
	<build>
		<plugins>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
				<artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>

        <repositories>
            <repository>
                <id>aliyun-repos</id>
                <url>https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/public</url>
                <releases>
                    <enabled>true</enabled>
                </releases>
                <snapshots>
                    <enabled>false</enabled>
                </snapshots>
            </repository>
        </repositories>
        <pluginRepositories>
            <pluginRepository>
                <id>aliyun-repos</id>
                <url>https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/public</url>
                <releases>
                    <enabled>true</enabled>
                </releases>
                <snapshots>
                    <enabled>false</enabled>
                </snapshots>
            </pluginRepository>

Perfect! The migration is complete and successful. Here's what was done:

## Migration Summary

The Java 8 project has been successfully migrated to Java 17. The following changes were made:

### 1. **pom.xml Updates:**
   - Updated Spring Boot version from `2.1.3.RELEASE` to `3.2.2` (latest stable version compatible with Java 17)
   - Updated Java version from `1.8` to `17`
   - Removed deprecated `fork` configuration parameter from spring-boot-maven-plugin

### 2. **Test Code Updates (JUnit 4 to JUnit 5):**
   - **ApplicationTests.java**: Updated imports from `org.junit.*` to `org.junit.jupiter.api.*`
   - **HelloWorldControlerTests.java**: Updated JUnit annotations (`@Before` → `@BeforeEach`, removed `@RunWith`)
   - **HelloTests.java**: Updated JUnit annotations (`@Before` → `@BeforeEach`, removed `@RunWith`)

### 3. **Build Verification:**
   - All tests pass successfully (3 tests run, 0 failures)
   - The project compiles with Java 17 (javac 17.0.17)
   - `mvn clean verify` completes successfully

The codebase is now fully compatible with Java 17 and uses the latest Spring Boot 3.2.2 framework with JUnit 5 for testing.
